X Field:
About Product Bundle

Aggregate group of Items into another Item. This is useful if you are bundling a certain Items into a package and you maintain stock of the packed Items and not the aggregate Item.

The package Item will have Is Stock Item as No and Is Sales Item as Yes.

Example:

If you are selling Laptops and Backpacks separately and have a special price if the customer buys both, then the Laptop + Backpack will be a new Product Bundle Item.
X軸欄位:
套件

將一組物料組合成另一個套件物料.適用於套件包含的物料屬於庫存物料，套件本身只是用於銷售，在物料主資料中勾選允許銷售，不勾選允許庫存

比如:

你單獨出售筆記型電腦和電腦包，希望給同時購買筆記型電腦和電腦包的客戶特別的優惠，就可以將筆記型電腦和電腦包組合成一個套件

X Field:
Aggregate group of **Items** into another **Item**. This is useful if you are bundling a certain **Items** into a package and you maintain stock of the packed **Items** and not the aggregate **Item**. 

The package **Item** will have "Is Stock Item" as "No" and "Is Sales Item" as "Yes".

For Example: If you are selling Laptops and Backpacks separately and have a special price if the customer buys both, then the Laptop + Backpack will be a new Product Bundle Item.

Note: BOM = Bill of Materials
X軸欄位: 將一組物料組合成一個新物料。即將一組物料組合打包/包裝，然後維護這個套件的庫存。套件物料屬性為：“允許庫存”（取值“否”），或“允許銷售”（取值“是”）。例如：你分別銷售筆記型電腦和背包，並且如果有客戶採購兩種而使用單獨的價格，那麼筆記型電腦+背包將是一個新的套件物料。註：物料BOM =Bill of Materials

X Field: Standard tax template that can be applied to all Purchase Transactions. This template can contain list of tax heads and also other expense heads like "Shipping", "Insurance", "Handling" etc.#### NoteThe tax rate you define here will be the standard tax rate for all **Items**. If there are **Items** that have different rates, they must be added in the **Item Tax** table in the **Item** master.#### Description of Columns1. Calculation Type:     - This can be on **Net Total** (that is the sum of basic amount).    - **On Previous Row Total / Amount** (for cumulative taxes or charges). If you select this option, the tax will be applied as a percentage of the previous row (in the tax table) amount or total.    - **Actual** (as mentioned).2. Account Head: The Account ledger under which this tax will be booked3. Cost Center: If the tax / charge is an income (like shipping) or expense it needs to be booked against a Cost Center.4. Description: Description of the tax (that will be printed in invoices / quotes).5. Rate: Tax rate.6. Amount: Tax amount.7. Total: Cumulative total to this point.8. Enter Row: If based on "Previous Row Total" you can select the row number which will be taken as a base for this calculation (default is the previous row).9. Consider Tax or Charge for: In this section you can specify if the tax / charge is only for valuation (not a part of total) or only for total (does not add value to the item) or for both.10. Add or Deduct: Whether you want to add or deduct the tax.
X軸欄位: 標準稅項模板可應用到所有採購交易中。此模板可以包含多個稅項及其他的費用項(例如“運費”，“保險費”，“處理費”等)。###需要注意的是，這裡指定的是試用於相關單據中所有物料的標準稅費率。如果某些物料的稅費率與標準稅費率不同，則您必須在“物料主資料”內的“物料稅項”內新增。####列說明1. 計算類型：-“淨總計”(即基本總額)；-“基於前一行的總計/金額”(用於累計稅費率)，選擇此項則稅費將基於前一行的總計/金額按百分比計算；-“實際”(按實際輸入)。2. 一級科目： 此稅費對應的記帳科目。3. 成本中心： 如果此稅費為收益或支出，那麼必須指定一個成本中心。4. 說明：稅費項的說明，會被用於如發票/報價的列印中。5. 稅率：稅項的比率6. 金額：稅項金額7. 總計：到這裡為止的累計8. 輸入行： 如果選擇了“基於前一行的總計/金額”，你可以選擇此稅項基於的行數(預設為前一行)。9. 稅費應用於：你可以在此部分指定此稅費影響庫存計價(即不再是總計的一部分)， 或者僅作為總計的一部分，而不單獨附加到每個物料上，或兩者。10. 新增或扣除： 新增還是扣除此稅費。

X Field: Standard tax template that can be applied to all Sales Transactions. This template can contain list of tax heads and also other expense / income heads like "Shipping", "Insurance", "Handling" etc.#### NoteThe tax rate you define here will be the standard tax rate for all **Items**. If there are **Items** that have different rates, they must be added in the **Item Tax** table in the **Item** master.#### Description of Columns1. Calculation Type:     - This can be on **Net Total** (that is the sum of basic amount).    - **On Previous Row Total / Amount** (for cumulative taxes or charges). If you select this option, the tax will be applied as a percentage of the previous row (in the tax table) amount or total.    - **Actual** (as mentioned).2. Account Head: The Account ledger under which this tax will be booked3. Cost Center: If the tax / charge is an income (like shipping) or expense it needs to be booked against a Cost Center.4. Description: Description of the tax (that will be printed in invoices / quotes).5. Rate: Tax rate.6. Amount: Tax amount.7. Total: Cumulative total to this point.8. Enter Row: If based on "Previous Row Total" you can select the row number which will be taken as a base for this calculation (default is the previous row).9. Is this Tax included in Basic Rate?: If you check this, it means that this tax will not be shown below the item table, but will be included in the Basic Rate in your main item table. This is useful where you want give a flat price (inclusive of all taxes) price to customers.
X軸欄位: 標準稅項模板可應用到所有銷售交易中。此模板可以包含多個稅項及其他的開支/收益項(例如“運費”，“保險費”，“處理費”等)。###需要注意的是，這裡指定的是適用於整張單據所有物料的標準稅費率。如果某些物料的稅費率與這裡指定的標準稅費率，則您必須在“物料主資料”內的“物料稅項”內新增。####列說明1. 計算類型：-“淨總計”(即基本總額)；-“基於前一行的總計/金額”(用於累計稅費率)，選擇此項則稅費將基於前一行的總計/金額按百分比計算；-“實際”(按實際輸入)。2. 科目： 此稅費對應的記帳科目。3. 成本中心： 如果此稅費為收入或費用，那麼必須指定一個成本中心。4. 說明：稅費項的說明，會被用於如發票/報價的列印中。5. 稅率：稅項的比率6. 金額：稅項金額7. 總計：到這裡為止的累計8. 輸入行： 如果選擇了“基於前一行的總計/金額”，你可以選擇此稅項基於的行數(預設為前一行)。9. 價內稅？：勾選此項則意味著此稅項不會再單獨出現在銷售訂單物料項清單下方，此稅費率會體現在物料售價中。如果您需要向客戶提供打包價而不是詳細價格(即包含所有稅費)，此選項就會很有用。

X Field:
Custom Script Help

Custom Scripts are executed only on the client-side (i.e. in Forms). Here are some examples to get you started



// fetch local_tax_no on selection of customer 
// cur_frm.add_fetch(link_field,  source_fieldname,  target_fieldname); 
cur_frm.add_fetch('customer',  'local_tax_no',  'local_tax_no');

// additional validation on dates 
frappe.ui.form.on('Task',  'validate',  function(frm) {
    if (frm.doc.from_date < get_today()) {
        msgprint('You can not select past date in From Date');
        validated = false;
    } 
});

// make a field read-only after saving 
frappe.ui.form.on('Task',  {
    refresh: function(frm) {
        // use the __islocal value of doc,  to check if the doc is saved or not
        frm.set_df_property('myfield',  'read_only',  frm.doc.__islocal ? 0 : 1);
    } 
});

// additional permission check
frappe.ui.form.on('Task',  {
    validate: function(frm) {
        if(user=='user1@example.com' && frm.doc.purpose!='Material Receipt') {
            msgprint('You are only allowed Material Receipt');
            validated = false;
        }
    } 
});

// calculate sales incentive
frappe.ui.form.on('Sales Invoice',  {
    validate: function(frm) {
        // calculate incentives for each person on the deal
        total_incentive = 0
        $.each(frm.doc.sales_team,  function(i,  d) {
            // calculate incentive
            var incentive_percent = 2;
            if(frm.doc.base_grand_total > 400) incentive_percent = 4;
            // actual incentive
            d.incentives = flt(frm.doc.base_grand_total) * incentive_percent / 100;
            total_incentive += flt(d.incentives)
        });
        frm.doc.total_incentive = total_incentive;
    } 
})
X軸欄位:
用戶端腳本說明

用戶端腳本僅在單據表單界面被觸發調用.請參考以下示範代碼



// 選擇客戶後帶出稅號 
// cur_frm.add_fetch(連結欄位,自動帶出的關聯欄位（連結單據）, 目標欄位); 
cur_frm.add_fetch('customer',  'local_tax_no',  'local_tax_no');

// 對日期進行額外校驗
frappe.ui.form.on('Task',  'validate',  function(frm) {
    if (frm.doc.from_date < get_today()) {
        msgprint('開始日期不能早於今天');
        validated = false;
    } 
});

// 保存後將欄位設為只讀
frappe.ui.form.on('Task',  {
    refresh: function(frm) {
        // 可使用單據的 __islocal 屬性判斷當前單據是否在新建狀態
        frm.set_df_property('myfield',  'read_only',  frm.doc.__islocal ? 0 : 1);
    } 
});

// 額外的權限檢查
frappe.ui.form.on('Task',  {
    validate: function(frm) {
        if(user=='user1@example.com' && frm.doc.purpose!='Material Receipt') {
            msgprint('你沒有物料收貨權限');
            validated = false;
        }
    } 
});

// 計算銷售提成
frappe.ui.form.on('Sales Invoice',  {
    validate: function(frm) {
        // 基於每筆交易為每個人計算提成
        total_incentive = 0
        $.each(frm.doc.sales_team,  function(i,  d) {
            // 計算提成
            var incentive_percent = 2;
            if(frm.doc.base_grand_total > 400) incentive_percent = 4;
            // 實際提成
            d.incentives = flt(frm.doc.base_grand_total) * incentive_percent / 100;
            total_incentive += flt(d.incentives)
        });
        frm.doc.total_incentive = total_incentive;
    } 
})

X Field:
Help

Notes:

  1. Use field base for using base salary of the Employee
  2. Use Salary Component abbreviations in conditions and formulas. BS = Basic Salary
  3. Use field name for employee details in conditions and formulas. Employment Type = employment_typeBranch = branch
  4. Use field name from Salary Slip in conditions and formulas. Payment Days = payment_daysLeave without pay = leave_without_pay
  5. Direct Amount can also be entered based on Condtion. See example 3

Examples

  1. Calculating Basic Salary based on base 
    Condition: base < 10000
    Formula: base * .2
  2. Calculating HRA based on Basic SalaryBS 
    Condition: BS > 2000
    Formula: BS * .1
  3. Calculating TDS based on Employment Typeemployment_type 
    Condition: employment_type=="Intern"
    Amount: 1000
X軸欄位:
幫助

說明:

  1. 欄位 base表示員工的基本工資
  2. 在條件與公式中可引用薪資構成縮寫程式碼 BS = 基本工資
  3. 在條件與公式中可引用員工表中的欄位 Employment Type = employment_typeBranch = branch
  4. 在條件與公式中可引用工資單欄位 Payment Days = payment_daysLeave without pay = leave_without_pay
  5. 金額欄位可以寫條件公式，詳見以下範例3

範例

  1. 基於基本工資計算工資 base 
    條件: base < 10000
    公式: base * .2
  2. 基於基本工資計算租房津貼BS 
    條件: BS > 2000
    公式: BS * .1
  3. 基本員工類型計算代扣所得稅employment_type 
    條件: employment_type=="Intern"
    Amount: 1000

How to get fieldnames

The fieldnames you can use in your email template are the fields in the document from which you are sending the email. You can find out the fields of any documents via Setup > Customize Form View and selecting the document type (e.g. Sales Invoice)

Templating

Templates are compiled using the Jinja Templating Langauge. To learn more about Jinja, read this documentation.

X Field:
Custom CSS Help

Notes:

  1. All field groups (label + value) are set attributes data-fieldtype and data-fieldname
  2. All values are given class value
  3. All Section Breaks are given class section-break
  4. All Column Breaks are given class column-break

Examples

1. Left align integers

[data-fieldtype="Int"] .value { text-left: left; }

1. Add border to sections except the last section

.section-break { padding: 30px 0px; border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; }
.section-break:last-child { padding-bottom: 0px; border-bottom: 0px;  }
X軸欄位:
自訂樣式 CSS 幫助

備註:

  1. 所有欄位組 (標籤 + 值) 都帶屬性值 data-fieldtype 和 data-fieldname
  2. 所有值有類class屬性 value
  3. 所有節有類型class屬性 section-break
  4. 所有欄有類claa屬性column-break

範例

1. 整數欄位左對齊

[data-fieldtype="Int"] .value { text-left: left; }

1. 除最後一節外，所有節加邊框

.section-break { padding: 30px 0px; border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; }
.section-break:last-child { padding-bottom: 0px; border-bottom: 0px;  }

X Field:
Print Format Help

Introduction

Print itemsFormats are rendered on the server side using the Jinja Templating Language. All forms have access to the doc object which contains information about the document that is being formatted. You can also access common utilities via the frappe module.

For styling, the Boostrap CSS framework is provided and you can enjoy the full range of classes.

References

  1. Jinja Tempalting Language: Reference
  2. Bootstrap CSS Framework

Example

<h3>{{ doc.select_print_heading or "Invoice" }}</h3>
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-3 text-right">Customer Name</div>
	<div class="col-md-9">{{ doc.customer_name }}</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-3 text-right">Date</div>
	<div class="col-md-9">{{ doc.get_formatted("invoice_date") }}</div>
</div>
<table class="table table-bordered">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<th>Sr</th>
			<th>Item Name</th>
			<th>Description</th>
			<th class="text-right">Qty</th>
			<th class="text-right">Rate</th>
			<th class="text-right">Amount</th>
		</tr>
		{%- for row in doc.items -%}
		<tr>
			<td style="width: 3%;">{{ row.idx }}</td>
			<td style="width: 20%;">
				{{ row.item_name }}
				{% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%}
				<br>Item Code: {{ row.item_code}}
				{%- endif %}
			</td>
			<td style="width: 37%;">
				<div style="border: 0px;">{{ row.description }}</div></td>
			<td style="width: 10%; text-align: right;">{{ row.qty }} {{ row.uom or row.stock_uom }}</td>
			<td style="width: 15%; text-align: right;">{{
				row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }}</td>
			<td style="width: 15%; text-align: right;">{{
				row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}</td>
		</tr>
		{%- endfor -%}
	</tbody>
</table>

Common Functions

doc.get_formatted("[fieldname]", [parent_doc]) Get document value formatted as Date, Currency etc. Pass parent doc for curreny type fields.
frappe.db.get_value("[doctype]", "[name]", "fieldname") Get value from another document.
X軸欄位:
列印格式幫助

介紹

列印格式技術上基於伺服器端的Jinja模板. 可訪問單據對象 doc 其中包括了需格式化輸出的所有欄位. 還可通過 frappe 模組調用一些通用函數.

樣式表基於Boostrap樣式表，可使用其自帶的各種類class

參考

  1. Jinja 模板語言: 參考
  2. Bootstrap 樣式

範例

<h3>{{ doc.select_print_heading or "發票" }}</h3>
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-3 text-right">客戶</div>
	<div class="col-md-9">{{ doc.customer_name }}</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-3 text-right">Date</div>
	<div class="col-md-9">{{ doc.get_formatted("invoice_date") }}</div>
</div>
<table class="table table-bordered">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<th>序號</th>
			<th>物料</th>
			<th>描述</th>
			<th class="text-right">數量</th>
			<th class="text-right">單價</th>
			<th class="text-right">金額</th>
		</tr>
		{%- for row in doc.items -%}
		<tr>
			<td style="width: 3%;">{{ row.idx }}</td>
			<td style="width: 20%;">
				{{ row.item_name }}
				{% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%}
				<br>Item Code: {{ row.item_code}}
				{%- endif %}
			</td>
			<td style="width: 37%;">
				<div style="border: 0px;">{{ row.description }}</div></td>
			<td style="width: 10%; text-align: right;">{{ row.qty }} {{ row.uom or row.stock_uom }}</td>
			<td style="width: 15%; text-align: right;">{{
				row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }}</td>
			<td style="width: 15%; text-align: right;">{{
				row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}</td>
		</tr>
		{%- endfor -%}
	</tbody>
</table>

Common Functions

doc.get_formatted("[fieldname]", [parent_doc]) 將單據欄位內容格式化為日期，貨幣等，將主單據 doc 貨幣欄位作為參數.
frappe.db.get_value("[doctype]", "[name]", "fieldname") 從另一個單據獲取資料

X Field:
# Track Material Request


Also known as Purchase Request or an Indent, is a document identifying a requirement of a set of items (products or services) for various purposes like procurement, transfer, issue, or manufacturing. Once the Material Request is validated, a purchase manager can take the next actions for purchasing items like requesting RFQ from a supplier or directly placing an order with an identified Supplier.
X軸欄位:
# 管理物料需求

物料需求又稱採購需求，是因採購、調撥、生產等目的產生的對原材料的需求，物料需求被審批後，可以下推詢價、報價或直接生成採購訂單

X Field:
# Create first Purchase Order

Purchase Order is at the heart of your buying transactions. In ERPNext, Purchase Order can can be created against a Purchase Material Request (indent) and Supplier Quotation as well.  Purchase Orders is also linked to Purchase Receipt and Purchase Invoices, allowing you to keep a birds-eye view on your purchase deals.
X軸欄位: 採購訂單是採購業務的核心，採購訂單可由物料需求、供應商報價或銷售訂單下推，從採購訂單可下推(關聯)採購入庫、採購發票、付款

X Field:
# Buying Settings


Buying module's features are highly configurable as per your business needs. Buying Settings is the place where you can set your preferences for:

- Supplier naming and default values
- Billing and shipping preference in buying transactions
X軸欄位:
# 採購設定

X Field:
## Products and Services

Depending on the nature of your business, you might be selling products or services to your clients or even both. 
ERPNext is optimized for itemized management of your sales and purchase.

The **Item Master**  is where you can add all your sales items. If you are in services, you can create an Item for each service that you offer. If you run a manufacturing business, the same master is used for keeping a record of raw materials, sub-assemblies etc.

Completing the Item Master is very essential for the successful implementation of ERPNext. We have a brief video introducing the item master for you, you can watch it in the next step.
X軸欄位:
## 產品與服務

你可能出售產品或服務，或者同時出售產品和服務給客戶，產品和服務在本系統中都被定義為物料主資料,被銷售、採購、庫存等業務流程使用

正確完整地維護物料主資料對於系統實施到關重要。

X Field:
## Who is a Customer?

A customer, who is sometimes known as a client, buyer, or purchaser is the one who receives goods, services, products, or ideas, from a seller for a monetary consideration.

Every customer needs to be assigned a unique id. Customer name itself can be the id or you can set a naming series for ids to be generated in Selling Settings.

Just like the supplier, let's quickly create a customer.
X軸欄位:
## 誰是客戶

客戶是購買產品、服務的組織

每個客戶須有(唯一識別)客戶號，可在銷售(模組)設定中選擇客戶號生成方式：客戶名或自動流水碼

X Field:
# Create an Item

Item is a product or a service offered by your company, or something you buy as a part of your supplies or raw materials.

Items are integral to everything you do in ERPNext - from billing, purchasing to managing inventory. Everything you buy or sell, whether it is a physical product or a service is an Item. Items can be stock, non-stock, variants, serialized, batched, assets, etc.
X軸欄位:
# 創建物料

物料可以是貴公司的產品或服務，亦可為貿易商品或原材料等。

物料是 ERPNext 中的關鍵基礎資料 - 用於採購、生產、銷售、庫存管理各個環節。 採購、銷售中涉及的實物或服務都是物料。 物料有允許庫存、多規格、序號、批號、允許資產等屬性。

X Field:
# Create a Customer

The Customer master is at the heart of your sales transactions. Customers are linked in Quotations, Sales Orders, Invoices, and Payments. Customers can be either numbered or identified by name (you would typically do this based on the number of customers you have).

Through Customer’s master, you can effectively track essentials like:
 - Customer’s multiple address and contacts
 - Account Receivables
 - Credit Limit and Credit Period
X軸欄位:
# 創建客戶

客戶是銷售模組核心主資料。用於報價單、銷售訂單、銷售發票和收付款憑證。 取決於客戶數量多少，可以基於客戶名或編號模板生成客戶號（唯一識別碼）。

客戶主資料可以管理以下重要資訊：
 - 多個地址和聯絡人
 - 應收帳款
 - 信用額度和信用期限

X Field:
# All about sales invoice

A Sales Invoice is a bill that you send to your Customers against which the Customer makes the payment. Sales Invoice is an accounting transaction. On submission of Sales Invoice, the system updates the receivable and books income against a Customer Account.
X軸欄位:
銷售發票

銷售發票是您發送給客戶的帳單，客戶根據該帳單付款。 銷售發票屬於會計相關業務。 提交銷售發票後，系統會自動生成會計憑證並更新應收帳款

X Field:
# Selling Settings

CRM and Selling module’s features are configurable as per your business needs. Selling Settings is the place where you can set your preferences for:
 - Customer naming and default values
 - Billing and shipping preference in sales transactions
X軸欄位:
# 銷售設定

客戶關係管理和銷售模組的功能可根據您的業務需求進行配置。 主要可配置項為：
  - 客戶號和預設值
  - 開票和運輸設定

X Field:
# Sales Order

A Sales Order is a confirmation of an order from your customer. It is also referred to as Proforma Invoice.

Sales Order at the heart of your sales and purchase transactions. Sales Orders are linked in Delivery Note, Sales Invoices, Material Request, and Maintenance transactions. Through Sales Order, you can track fulfillment of the overall deal towards the customer.
X軸欄位:
＃ 銷售訂單

銷售訂單是對客戶訂單的確認。 有時也被稱為形式發票。

銷售訂單是銷售和採購交易的核心。 主要被銷售出庫、銷售發票、物料需求和維護巡修單引用。 通過銷售訂單，您可以跟蹤對客戶訂單的履行情況。

X Field:
# Chart Of Accounts

ERPNext sets up a simple chart of accounts for each Company you create, but you can modify it according to business and legal requirements.
X軸欄位:
# 科目表
創建公司時會基於預設科目表模板創建會計科目表，可根據業務和法律要求增補及修改科目表。

X Field:
# Account Settings

In ERPNext, Accounting features are configurable as per your business needs. Accounts Settings is the place to define some of your accounting preferences like:

 - Credit Limit and over billing settings
 - Taxation preferences
 - Deferred accounting preferences
X軸欄位:
＃ 會計設定

在 ERPNext 中，會計功能可根據您的業務需求進行配置。 主要的可配置項如下：

  - 信用額度和超額開票容差
  - 稅費模板
  - 遞延會計

X Field:
# Setting up Taxes

ERPNext lets you configure your taxes so that they are automatically applied in your buying and selling transactions. You can configure them globally or even on Items. ERPNext taxes are pre-configured for most regions.
X軸欄位:
# 設定稅費

ERPNext 允許您配置稅費模板，以便在採購與銷售業務中自動計稅。 可按訂單計稅也可以按物料明細行計稅。 正常情況下系統自帶的稅費模板就夠用了。

X Field:
# Account Settings

This is a crucial piece of configuration. There are various account settings in ERPNext to restrict and configure actions in the Accounting module.

The following settings are avaialble for you to configure

1. Account Freezing 
2. Credit and Overbilling
3. Invoicing and Tax Automations
4. Balance Sheet configurations

There's much more, you can check it all out in this step
X軸欄位:
＃ 會計設定

ERPNext 中有很多會計設定可用於限制和配置會計模組中的操作。

以下是主要可配置項

1. 鎖帳
2. 信用和超額計費
3. 發票和自動計稅
4. 資產負債表配置

還有更多，您可以在這一步中全部查看

X Field: # Cost Centers for Budgeting and Analysis While your Books of Accounts are framed to fulfill statutory requirements, you can set up Cost Center and Accounting Dimensions to address your companies reporting and budgeting requirements. Click here to learn more about how [Cost Center](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/v13/user/manual/en/accounts/cost-center) and [Dimensions](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/v13/user/manual/en/accounts/accounting-dimensions) allow you to get advanced financial analytics reports from ERPNext.
X軸欄位:
# 成本中心預算與分析

雖然會計總帳主要目標是為滿足法定要求，但您可以設定成本中心和輔助核算來滿足公司的報表和預算要求。

允許您從 ERPNext 獲取高級財務分析報表。

X Field:
# Create your first Purchase Invoice

A Purchase Invoice is a bill received from a Supplier for a product(s) or service(s) delivery to your company. You can track payables through Purchase Invoice and process Payment Entries against it.

Purchase Invoices can also be created against a Purchase Order or Purchase Receipt.
X軸欄位:
# 創建第一張採購發票

採購發票是供應商發給貴公司交付產品或服務的帳單（發票）。 您可以通過採購發票跟蹤應付帳款並根據其處理付款分錄。

還可以根據採購訂單或採購入庫創建採購發票。

X Field:
# Updating Opening Balances

Once you close the financial statement in previous accounting software, you can update the same as opening in your ERPNext's Balance Sheet accounts. This will allow you to get complete financial statements from ERPNext in the coming years, and discontinue the parallel accounting system right away.
X軸欄位:
# 更新期初餘額

一旦您在以前的會計軟體中關閉了財務報表，您就可以像在 ERPNext 的資產負債表帳戶中打開財務報表一樣進行更新。 這將使您能夠在未來幾年從 ERPNext 獲得完整的財務報表，並立即停止並行會計系統。

X Field: # Financial Statements In ERPNext, you can get crucial financial reports like [Balance Sheet] and [Profit and Loss] statements with a click of a button. You can run in the report for a different period and plot analytics charts premised on statement data. For more reports, check sections like Financial Statements, General Ledger, and Profitability reports. [Check Accounting reports](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/v13/user/manual/en/accounts/accounting-reports)
X軸欄位: # 財務報表 在 ERPNext 中，您只需單擊一個按鈕即可獲得重要的財務報表，例如[資產負債表]和[損益表]。 您可以按不同財務期間生成報表，並根據報表資料繪製分析圖表。 如需更多報告，請查看財務報表、總帳和盈利能力報告等部分。 [查看會計報表](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/v13/user/manual/en/accounts/accounting-reports)

X軸欄位: 快速瀏覽固定資產科目設定

X Field:
# Fixed Asset Accounts

With the company, a host of fixed asset accounts are pre-configured. To ensure your asset transactions are leading to correct accounting entries, you can review and set up following asset accounts as per your business  requirements.
 - Fixed asset accounts (Asset account)
 - Accumulated depreciation
 - Capital Work in progress (CWIP) account
 - Asset Depreciation account (Expense account)
X軸欄位:
# 固定資產科目

默認科目表自帶了許多固定資產科目。 為了確保您的資產業務生成正確的會計分錄，您可以根據您的業務需求查看和設定以下資產科目。
  - 固定資產（資產科目）
  - 累計折舊
  - 在建工程
  - 資產折舊（費用科目）

X Field:
# Add an Existing Asset

If you are just starting with ERPNext, you will need to enter Assets you already possess. You can add them as existing fixed assets in ERPNext. Please note that you will have to make a Journal Entry separately updating the opening balance in the fixed asset account.
X軸欄位:
# 新增現有資產

如果您剛剛開始使用 ERPNext，您將需要輸入您已經擁有的資產。 您可以將它們新增為 ERPNext 中的現有固定資產。 請注意，您必須單獨製作日記帳分錄，更新固定資產帳戶中的期初餘額。

X Field:
# Asset Category

An Asset Category classifies different assets of a Company.

You can create an Asset Category based on the type of assets. For example, all your desktops and laptops can be part of an Asset Category named "Electronic Equipments". Create a separate category for furniture. Also, you can update default properties for each category, like:
 - Depreciation type and duration
 - Fixed asset account
 - Depreciation account
X軸欄位:
# 資產類別

資產類別對公司的不同資產進行分類。

您可以根據資產類型創建資產類別。 例如，您的所有桌電和筆記型電腦都可以屬於名為“電子設備”的資產類別。 為家具創建一個單獨的類別。 此外，您還可以更新每個類別的默認屬性，例如：

  - 折舊類型和期限
  - 固定資產科目
  - 折舊科目

X Field:
# Purchase an Asset

Assets purchases process if done following the standard Purchase cycle. If capital work in progress is enabled in Asset Category, Asset will be created as soon as Purchase Receipt is created for it. You can quickly create a Purchase Receipt for Asset and see its impact on books of accounts.
X軸欄位:
# 購買資產

如果按照標準購買週期完成資產購買流程。 如果在資產類別中啟用了在建工程，則在為其創建採購入庫後將立即創建資產。 您可以快速創建資產採購入庫並查看其對帳簿的影響。

X Field:
# Asset Item

Asset items are created based on Asset Category. You can create one or multiple items against once Asset Category. The sales and purchase transaction for Asset is done via Asset Item.
X軸欄位:
# 固定資產物料號

固定資產物料號是根據資產類別創建的。 您可以針對一個資產類別創建一個或多個物料號。 資產的買賣交易是通過資產物料號完成的。

X Field:
Naming Options:
field:[fieldname] - By Fieldautoincrement - Uses Databases' Auto Increment featurenaming_series: - By Naming Series (field called naming_series must be present)Prompt - Prompt user for a name[series] - Series by prefix (separated by a dot); for example PRE.#####
